name: flickr.photosets.getInfo
authentication: This method does not require authentication.

arguments.name: api_key
arguments.description: Your API application key.See herefor more details.

arguments.name: photoset_id
arguments.description: The ID of the photoset to fetch information for.

arguments.name: user_id
arguments.description: The user_id here is the owner of the set passed in photoset_id.

response:
<photoset id="72157624618609504" owner="34427469121@N01" primary="4847770787" secret="6abd09a292" server="4153" farm="5" photos="55" count_views="523" count_comments="1" count_photos="43" count_videos="12" can_comment="1" date_create="1280530593" date_update="1308091378">
  <title>Mah Kittehs</title>
  <description>Sixty and Niner. Born on the 3rd of May, 2010, or thereabouts. Came to my place on Thursday, July 29, 2010.</description>
</photoset>

errors.title: Photoset not foundThe photoset id was not valid.
